pos_mean_info_list.mean: （美）野外郊游时烹调的野餐；野烹食物
炊具；烹饪用水果；窜改者

bilingual.source: I have a cooking class with your grandma!
Different parts of China have different styles of cooking.
bilingual.target: 中国的不同地区有不同的烹饪风格。

bilingual.source: I have always loved cooking so I'm going to be a chef.
bilingual.target: 我一直喜欢烹饪，所以我要成为厨师。

bilingual.source: The occasion is more enjoyable without all that tiring cooking, and the dishes taste better!
bilingual.target: 没有那些累人的烹饪，这个场合更愉快，菜肴也更美味！

bilingual.source: American cooking often mixes things from around the world to make something completely new.
bilingual.target: 美国烹饪经常混合来自世界各地的食材，创造出全新的东西。

bilingual.source: Mohan sat tall, breathing in the tropical scent blowing off the Arabian Sea nearby and the rich smells of spicy cooking.
bilingual.target: 莫汉坐得笔直，呼吸着附近阿拉伯海吹来的热带气息和浓郁的香料烹饪气味。

bilingual.source: She compares her cooking to that of a professional chef.
bilingual.target: 她比较了自己的烹饪和专业厨师的烹饪。
她在烹饪方面是个高手。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not talking about cooking. I'm talking about guts. This really means that much to you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不是指烹饪，我说的是勇气，那对你真的很重要吗?

yingyinNormal.en: Nah, Monica's watching some cooking show. Come on, I don't want to miss when they were skinny.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不行，莫妮卡在看烹饪节目，快点，我想看她们瘦的时候。

yingyinNormal.en: This is so nice. Thank you for doing this. Oh, please. Cooking soothes me. So, dig in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真好，谢谢你这么费心。别客气，烹饪能舒缓我的心，吃吧，好。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh no. I don't know anything about cooking. I had to ask someone what it's called when the water makes those little bubbles.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我不懂烹饪，我不知道水冒泡后要做什么。

yingyinNormal.en: Cooking like this will burn off some of the alcohol, but don't burn too much, because it makes a delicious sauce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 烹饪过程中，部分酒精会蒸发，但别蒸发过多，因为它是可口的酱料。

yingyinNormal.en: That's the sauce my mother uses. She likes cooking Italian because according to her, that's what the Romans made Jesus eat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我妈妈也用这种酱，她喜欢意式烹饪，她说罗马人也这么做给耶稣吃。

yingyinNormal.en: Remember that guy from cooking school I told you about that put cilantro with everything? Oh sure, Cilantro Larry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还记得我说过那个在烹饪学校，煮什么都加香菜的人吗？记得，香菜赖瑞嘛。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, golden rule when you're cooking meats or fish, we add a bit of Shaohsing rice wine, or dry sherry if you have it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 烹饪肉类和鱼类时的黄金法则是加入一些绍兴米酒，如果有的话也可以用干雪利酒。

yingyinNormal.en: And then a handful of Chinese mushrooms. Now these are really woody and earthy and fragrant, and these are used to create the most gorgeous stocks in Chinese cooking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后一把香菇。香菇有树木的清香，泥土的芳香，在中餐烹饪中，常用香菇给高汤调味。

yingyinNormal.en: Early on, I discovered I needed principles. Principles are smart ways for handling things that happen over and over again in similar situations. There are principles for everything, from skiing to parenting to cooking, and so on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很早就发现自己需要些法则。有了法则就能聪明地处理类似情况下经常发生的事。一切事都有法则，滑雪、育儿再到烹饪都一样。

yingyinNormal.en: How are the fish doing? That's cooking nicely.
yingyinNormal.zh: 鱼煎得怎么样了？卖相很不错。

yingyinNormal.en: Dry chillies are also an important ingredient in Chinese cooking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 干辣椒也是中国菜中的重要调料。

yingyinNormal.en: She takes pride in her work, her kitchen, her cooking, and us.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她为她的工作，厨房，厨艺而骄傲，也为我们骄傲。

yingyinNormal.en: How are your potatoes doing? They still need a bit more cooking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的土豆怎么样了？土豆还没好。

yingyinNormal.en: When you offer to pay your mother-in-law money for cooking dinner.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当你问想付给岳母做饭的钱时？

yingyinNormal.en: So when people compliment me on my cooking tonight, what do I say?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果今晚有人称赞我的手艺，我该怎么说？

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, I've been cooking all day. Well, now don't you feel silly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，我花了一整天时间煮呢。好吧，现在觉得自己蠢了吧。

yingyinNormal.en: While that's cooking, I'm going to very quickly chop up some vegetables.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在煮面过程中，我会快速地切碎一些蔬菜。

yingyinNormal.en: This is rosemary. I like to use it in my cooking. It smells interesting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是迷迭香，我喜欢用它来做菜。这个闻起来很有趣。

yingyinNormal.en: This is rosemary. I like to use it in my cooking. It smells interesting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是迷迭香，我喜欢用它来做菜。这个闻起来很有趣。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 烹调；烹饪；用于烹调的；烹调过的食物；适合烹调的
n. 炊具；烹调用具；宜煮食而非生吃的水果

word_family.mean: v. 烹调；煮；烧；篡改；伪造；干得起劲；做得欢；干得好

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Cooking</highlight> benefits people in many ways and enables them to connect with one another.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 烹饪在许多方面给人们带来好处，并使他们能够彼此联系。

examination_example.sentence: Like any skill, <highlight>cooking</highlight> gets easier as you do it more; every time you cook, you advance your level of skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像任何技能一样，烹饪越多越容易；每次你做饭，你都提高了你的技术水平。

examination_example.sentence: Carême's <highlight>cooking</highlight> displays became the symbol of fine French dining; they were plentiful, beautiful and imposing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Carême的烹饪展示成为法国美食的象征；它们数量众多，美丽壮观。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 烹调；烹饪；用于烹调的；烹调过的食物；适合烹调的

word_family.mean: v. 烹调；煮；烧；篡改；伪造；干得起劲；做得欢；干得好

examination_example.sentence: What can children do in the <highlight>cooking</highlight> course?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 孩子们可以在烹饪课程中做什么？

examination_example.sentence: Making a meal needs good planning, skillful <highlight>cooking</highlight>, control of temperature and a good nose!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 做一顿饭需要很好的计划，熟练的烹饪方法，对温度的控制和好的嗅觉！

examination_example.sentence: Therefore, you should learn some necessary and useful skills such as washing clothes and <highlight>cooking</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，你应该学习一些必要和有用的技能，比如洗衣服和做饭。
